AuthBase.accessAsGuest: Bincika ba tare da asusu ba
AuthBase.oidcGenericExplanation: Kolibri dandalin koyo ta yanar gizo ne. Ana iya amfani da asusun Kolibri wajen shiga wasu manhajoji da aka dauko hayar su.
AuthBase.oidcSpecificExplanation: An aiko ku nan daga manhajar '{app_name}'.Kolibri dandalin koyo ta yanar gizo ne, ana iya amfani da asusun ku na Kolibri wajen samun damar '{app_name}'.
AuthBase.restrictedAccess: An taƙaita samun damar shiga Kolibri da na'urorin waje
AuthBase.restrictedAccessDescription: Domin canza wannan, shiga a matsayin babban mai jagora sannan a sabunta saitunan samun damar cibiyar sadarwa na na'urar
AuthSelect.newUserPrompt: Shin kai sabon mai amfani ne?
BirthYearSelect.birthyearAriaLabel: Duba bayani game da bada shekarun haihuwar ka.
CommonUserPageStrings.signInPrompt: Shiga idan kuna da asusun data kasance akwai
CommonUserPageStrings.signingInToFacilit: Ana kan shiga ciki '{facility}' a matsayin '{user}'
DeviceUnusableStrings.deprovisioningErro: An sami tangarɗa yayin da ake kokarin shigar da Kolibri. A kara gwadawa.
DeviceUnusableStrings.noSuperuserCallToA: A shigar da Kolibri domin ƙirƙirar shafin babban mai amfani.
DeviceUnusableStrings.noSuperusersNotice: Ba za a iya amfani da wannan na'ura ba, saboda babu shafin babban mai amfani a kanta.
DeviceUnusableStrings.superusersSoftDele: Ka duba tsarin gudanarwar na'urarka domin kara shigar da shafin ko kara shigar da Kolibri domin kirkirar shafin babban mai amfani.
Ba za a iya amfani da wannan na'ura ba, sabida dukkan shafin babban mai amfani da ke kanta an goge shi daga rumbun bayanai.
DeviceUnusableStrings.unknownIssueNotice: Ba za a iya amfani da wannan na'ura ba, sakamakon matsalar da ba a gano ba. A tuntubi sashin gyara.
FacilitySelect.askAdminForAccountLabel: Tambayi mai gudanarwar ku don ƙirƙirar asusun domin waɗannan wuraren:
FacilitySelect.canSignUpForFacilityLabel: Zaɓi mahadan da kuke son haɗa sabon asusunku da:
FacilitySelect.selectFacilityLabel: Zaɓi makaman da ke da asusunka
NewPasswordPage.needToMakeNewPasswordLab: Sannu, {user}. Ana buƙatar ku saita sabon kalmar sirri don shiga asusunku.
SignInPage.incorrectPasswordError: Kalmar shigar ba daidai yake ba
SignInPage.requiredForCoachesAdmins: Ana buƙatar kalmar sirri don malamai da masu jagora
SignInPage.usernameNotFoundError: Ba a samu sunan mai amfani ba
SignUpPage.demographicInfoExplanation: Zai bayyana ga masu gudanarwa. Za a kuma yi amfani da shi don taimakawa wajen inganta manhajar da albarkatu na nau'ikan ɗalibai da buƙatu daban-daban.
SignUpPage.demographicInfoOptional: Samar da wannan bayanin ba tilas ba ne.
SignUpPage.privacyLinkText: Ƙarin ilimi game da amfani da sirri
TaskStrings.importSuccessStatus: Zauren karatum'{facilityName}' ya yi nasarar loda shi zuwa ga wannan na'urar.
TaskStrings.locallyIntegratingDataStatus: Ana kan haɗa bayanin da aka samu a cikin na'urar
TaskStrings.locallyPreparingDataStatus: Ana kan shirya bayanin da za'a tura a cikin na'urar
TaskStrings.taskLODFinishedByLabel: Asusu '{fullname}' daga '{facilityname}' ya yi nasarar shiga wannan na'ura
TaskStrings.unknownUsername: Ba a san mai amfani ba
